snippet: The independent study was meant to shed light on undiscovered cases after about 600 people filed claims against priests in 2010.
abstract: Germany's Roman Catholic bishops cancel study into sexual abuse of minors by priests, prompting investigator to accuse them of trying to censor what was to be major report on scandals.
lead_paragraph: The independent study was meant to shed light on undiscovered cases after about 600 people filed claims against priests in 2010.

headline.seo: German Bishops Cancel Study Into Sexual Abuse by Priests
headline.main: German Bishops Cancel Study Into Sexual Abuse by Priests
headline.print_headline: German Bishops Cancel Study Into Sexual Abuse by Priests
